column4: I've downloaded Dapper twice ... same result ... when I put in the CD with windows running, I get the live CD options ... but when I reboot, it loads things, and then I get a black screen with only the mouse pointer on it
iirc there are some boot options that allow you to modify the graphics (something like vga=771 or the like) - you can hit F1 at the boot prompt to find out what they are
I'll try that ...  what did you mean by iirc?
